text: Ezɨ Asirian gumaziba Atrivim Hesekia bagha akam amaga ghaze, a izɨ. Ezɨ a uan fofozir gumazibar dapanir 3pla amangizɨ, me Asirian gumazir kaba bativasa ghue. Kar, Hilkian otarim Eliakim, an atrivimɨn dɨpenimɨn garir gumazim, ko Sepna, atrivimɨn akɨnafariba osirir gumazim, ko Asapɨn otarim Joa, an atrivim amir bizibar eghaghaniba, bar ada osirir gumazim, me zui.
